segment.source: This section discusses storing data on the device in a private database and using object relational mapping in Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps.
segment.target: This section discusses storing data on the device in a private database and using object relational mapping in Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps.

segment.source: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
segment.target: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

segment.source: For Windows 8.x articles, see the archive
segment.target: For Windows 8.x articles, see the archive

segment.source: This section discusses storing data on the device in a private database and using object relational mapping in Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps.
segment.target: This section discusses storing data on the device in a private database and using object relational mapping in Universal Windows Platform (UWP) apps.

segment.source: SQLite is included in the UWP SDK.
segment.target: SQLite is included in the UWP SDK.

segment.source: Entity Framework 7 works with SQLite in UWP apps.
segment.target: Entity Framework 7 works with SQLite in UWP apps.

segment.source: Use these technologies to develop for offline / intermittent connectivity scenarios, and to persist data across app sessions.
segment.target: Use these technologies to develop for offline / intermittent connectivity scenarios, and to persist data across app sessions.

segment.source: Entity framework 7 with SQLite for C# apps
segment.target: Entity framework 7 with SQLite for C# apps

segment.source: Entity Framework (EF) is an object-relational mapper that enables you to work with relational data using domain-specific objects.
segment.target: Entity Framework (EF) is an object-relational mapper that enables you to work with relational data using domain-specific objects.

segment.source: This article explains how you can use Entity Framework 7 with a SQLite database in a Universal Windows app.
segment.target: This article explains how you can use Entity Framework 7 with a SQLite database in a Universal Windows app.

segment.source: SQLite is a server-less, embedded database engine.
segment.target: SQLite is a server-less, embedded database engine.

segment.source: This article explains how to use the SQLite library included in the SDK, package your own SQLite library in a Universal Windows app, or build it from the source.
segment.target: This article explains how to use the SQLite library included in the SDK, package your own SQLite library in a Universal Windows app, or build it from the source.
